ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 43
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/14/99 12:02:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... And what spell would this be?  If it is a DOT spell, it is resisted just as much as your
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/14/99 12:02:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
xscion@... writes:

> Level 49 Necromancer = 1400 damage for 300 mana, one cast. Now what do you
> think of Ice Comet? End of story.

And what spell would this be? If it is a DOT spell, it is resisted just as
much as your spells are (if not more). And if you are saying it is the
Lifetap line, I believe you have gotten some mistakern information. I am not
even sure where you got some of the information you have.

At 20, my tap spell does 67. The same level wizard is doing 150. Casting
the same spell FASTER... and the same amount of times I can cast the tap.
Now yes, I get healed, and almost never do less than 67 (I have seen it do
less, but very rarely) but that is not as much damage as the wizzard spell.

Please supply more concrete information with your mails.

Sonoroud Tomebinder
